name: MQTT subscribe topic
func:
let subscribeTopic = flow.get('trayProps').box + "/tray/" + flow.get('trayProps').type +'/' + flow.get('trayProps').name + "/setting/#";
return {action:"subscribe",topic:subscribeTopic};
